(5/5) This afternoon, the House of Representatives will receive a briefing on Iran from the 
@thejointstaff, @EsperDoD, @SecPompeo, and @CIA Director Haspel. I commend the President for keeping Congress and the American people apprised of this situation as developments unfold.

(4/5) President Trump implored Iranian leaders to direct their nation toward stability and cooperation. Only in doing so can Iran become economically sound, secure, and positively engaged on the geopolitical stage.
